text: Oscar Ugo De Pellegrin is an archer and shooter from Italy. De Pellegrin has a spinal cord injury. He won several national and international awards with archery. In 2000 he participated for the first time in the Paralympic Summer Games. With the team he won gold, individually the bronze medal. In 2004 he was excluded from the prizes. At the Games in Beijing (2008) he won a bronze medal with the team. == References == Category:Paralympic bronze medalists for Italy Category:Sportspeople from Veneto Category:Italian archers Category:Sport shooters
title: Oscar De Pellegrin
